title: Veil, 1800–50
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: White ground with polychrome print - central large-scale flowering tree flanked by small-scale tree on either side - floral sprays, animals, insects, birds scattered over ground- floral border surrounded by outer geometric border - urns and vases in foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Veil, 1800–50.
1800–50. Printed cotton mezzari. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-2.
